1.  DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
1.1 In this Agreement unless the context otherwise requires the following words shall have the following meaning: "AFFILIATES" means any company, corporation, partnership, joint venture or other entity that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with XFN; "CONTENT" means real-time economic news including articles, reports, data, information and such materials that have or have been and/or will be published from time to time and that is or will be in the possession or control of CEIS from time to time, in respect of the subject matters as more particularly described in Schedule 1; EFFECTIVE DATE means 18 May 2000; "INTELLECTUAL means patents, trade marks, service marks, trade names, PROPERTY RIGHTS" design rights (whether registrable or not), any applications for the foregoing, copyright and other assignable intellectual property -1- rights (whether registrable or not) in any country, including but not limited to the format, layout, and the look and feel of any of the Content; "TERM" means the term as set out in Clause 7; and "TERRITORY" means the world excluding the People's Republic of China.
perturbation.changed_text:
1.  DEFINITIONS AND INTERPRETATION
1.1 In this Agreement unless the context otherwise requires the following words shall have the following meaning: "AFFILIATES" means any company, corporation, partnership, joint venture or other entity that directly or indirectly controls, is controlled by or is under common control with XFN; "CONTENT" means any information or data provided by CEIS, the specific nature of which shall be determined at CEIS's sole discretion; EFFECTIVE DATE means 18 May 2000; "INTELLECTUAL means patents, trade marks, service marks, trade names, PROPERTY RIGHTS" design rights (whether registrable or not), any applications for the foregoing, copyright and other assignable intellectual property -1- rights (whether registrable or not) in any country, including but not limited to the format, layout, and the look and feel of any of the Content; "TERM" means the term as set out in Clause 7; and "TERRITORY" means the world excluding the People's Republic of China.
perturbation.explanation: The original definition of 'CONTENT' specifies 'real-time economic news including articles, reports, data, information and such materials'. The changed definition broadens this to 'any information or data provided by CEIS, the specific nature of which shall be determined at CEIS's sole discretion.' This creates a conflict because the original definition provides a specific scope, while the modified definition allows CEIS to unilaterally change the type of content provided, potentially undermining XFN's expectations and business model. This introduces uncertainty regarding what XFN is actually licensing and what CEIS is obligated to provide.

perturbation.original_text:
7. TERM
7.1 This Agreement shall take effect from the Effective Date and continue in full force and effect for twenty (20) years thereafter, unless otherwise terminated in accordance with Clause 8.
7.2 This Agreement may be renewed for an additional term of ten (10) years by notice in writing given by XFN to CEIS at the expiry of the Term, for a consideration to be mutually agreed.
perturbation.changed_text:
7. TERM
7.1 This Agreement shall take effect from the Effective Date and continue in full force and effect for twenty (20) years thereafter, unless otherwise terminated in accordance with Clause 8.
7.2 This Agreement may be renewed for an additional term of ten (10) years at CEIS's sole discretion, with no requirement for mutual agreement or notice.
perturbation.explanation: Original clause 7.2 states that the agreement may be renewed for an additional term of 10 years with written notice from XFN to CEIS and under a consideration to be mutually agreed. The modified clause states that it may be renewed at CEIS's sole discretion with no requirement for mutual agreement or notice. This creates uncertainty about the conditions for renewal.

perturbation.original_text:
8. TERMINATION
8.1 XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice to the CEIS.
8.2 Either Party may terminate this Agreement:
(a) if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is not capable of being remedied;
(b) if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring remedy; and
(c) if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.
8.3 Upon termination of the Agreement:
(a) CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate effect; and
(b) in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of the Term, XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the unexpired Term of this Agreement, together with interest from the date those sums were paid until the date of full refund.
perturbation.changed_text:
8. TERMINATION
8.1 XFN may terminate this Agreement by giving thirty (30) days written notice to the CEIS.
8.2 CEIS may terminate this Agreement at any time, for any reason, without notice or liability to XFN. Either Party may terminate this Agreement:
(a) if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is not capable of being remedied;
(b) if the other Party commits a material breach of this Agreement which is capable of being remedied but not remedied within thirty (30) days upon receiving written notice from the non-breaching party requiring remedy; and
(c) if the other Party becomes insolvent or bankrupt.
8.3 Upon termination of the Agreement:
(a) CEIS shall terminate the transmission of the Content with immediate effect; and
(b) in the event that this Agreement is terminated prior to the expiry of the Term, XFN shall forfeit any sums paid to CEIS in advance.
perturbation.explanation: The original agreement allows XFN to terminate with 30 days notice, and both parties can terminate for material breach or insolvency. Also, the original clause 8.3(b) states XFN shall recover any sums paid to CEIS in advance for the unexpired term. However, the modified clause 8.2 now states that CEIS may terminate at any time, for any reason, without notice or liability to XFN. Additionally, the modified clause 8.3(b) states that XFN shall forfeit any sums paid to CEIS in advance. This is contradictory because it introduces imbalance and conflict on termination rights and liabilities.
